refnamediv.refpurpose: inserts statements into the roll forward log

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The log_text function can be used to insert a SQL statement into the roll forward log.

The log_text function causes the SQL text given as first argument to be executed at roll forward time with the following arguments as parameters, bound from left to right to the parameter markers in the statement ('?'). There can be a maximum of 8 parameters but these can be arrays.

refsect2.title: text
refsect2.para:
VARCHAR
SQL statement to be added in the transaction log.

refsect2.title: arg1..arg8
refsect2.para: Parameters to be passed to logged statement.
